description: The world's largest pirate ship, owned by Gecko Moria. A massive ship designed to look like an island with forests, castles, and graveyards.

keyEvents.title: Brook Joins the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Brook formally asks to join the Straw Hat Pirates and is accepted by Luffy at Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the ninth Straw Hat crew member officially joins.

keyEvents.title: Rumbar Pirates Memorial
keyEvents.description: Usopp and Franky build a grave for the Rumbar Pirates at Thriller Bark, where Brook and Zoro pay their respects.
keyEvents.significance: Provides closure for Brook's tragic backstory before departing with his new crew.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially leave Thriller Bark on the Thousand Sunny, completing their adventure in the Florian Triangle.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Thriller Bark arc.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark remains operational after the Straw Hats' departure

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, a brigantine-type ship designed and built by Franky using wood from the legendary Adam Tree. Features the Soldier Dock System and Coup de Burst.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Vivre Card Discovery
keyEvents.description: On the Thousand Sunny, Luffy discovers that Ace's Vivre Card is burning and shrinking, indicating Ace is in mortal danger.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most critical foreshadowing moments that sets up the Impel Down and Marineford arcs.

keyEvents.title: Setting Sail with Full Crew
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny departs Thriller Bark with all nine Straw Hat crew members for the first time, heading toward Fishman Island.
keyEvents.significance: First voyage with the complete pre-timeskip crew.

keyEvents.title: Brook Experiences Coup de Burst
keyEvents.description: Brook witnesses the Thousand Sunny's Coup de Burst ability for the first time, amazed by the ship's capabilities.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Brook's integration as a new crew member experiencing the ship's features.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and departing Thriller Bark
